item.title: Secret Service Dismantles Telecom Threat Around U.N.
item.description: Investigators say it could have crippled cell towers, jammed 911 calls and flooded networks with chaos at the moment New York City was most vulnerable...

item.title: Want to Live a Longer, Healthier Life? Recent Science Says Your Genetics Are Only 2 Percent of the Longevity Equation
item.description: How you’re made does impact how long you’ll live, but what contributes more? What you do on a regular basis.

item.title: Disney Changed Its Mind on Jimmy Kimmel and It’s a Dangerous Lesson For Every Leader
item.description: Kimmel’s show returns on Tuesday, but the implications of Disney’s decisions will continue much longer.

item.title: Why Real Change Requires More Than Disruption
item.description: Disruption has brought us some great innovations—and destruction. Creating lasting change requires a more constructive tactic.

item.title: How Ben Goodwin Launched Olipop to Disrupt the Soda Market
item.description: The founder developed his company to sate consumers’ thirst for healthier options.
